content:
Sure, here are 10 common goals that these customer avatars have, excluding Daniel:

1. Create a variety of products that showcase their art, such as prints, paintings, and custom commissions.
2. Learn how to market and sell their products effectively on digital platforms like Etsy or Creative Market.
3. Build a website or social media presence to showcase their work.
4. Connect with other artists and build a supportive community.
5. Supplement their income through their art or turn their passion into a full-time business.
6. Learn how to navigate the digital marketplace and promote themselves effectively.
7. Build their skills in watercolour painting and experiment with different techniques and styles.
8. Develop a pricing strategy that is appropriate for their products and market demand.
9. Balance the creative and business sides of their work, maintaining their artistic vision while also running a profitable business.
10. Explore new opportunities to monetize their art, such as teaching workshops or licensing their designs.
